nodes.text: Peldon Minor was an astronomical object located within the Peldon Minor system. It was located in the star cluster that eventually became the Cassander subsector, a part of the Cassander sector in the New Territories portion of the Outer Rim Territories. During the Clone Wars, Galactic Republic colonel Hurst Romodi participated in military actions at Peldon Minor and was later decorated for his efforts while fighting there.

Peldon Minor was mentioned in the 2012 reference book The Essential Guide to Warfare, authored by Jason Fry and Paul R. Urquhart. The StarWars.com Online Companion to the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas placed the Peldon Minor system, and therefore the celestial body Peldon Minor, within grid square L-5.
